name: WPMU MarketPress Allow Comments
author: Alex (Shurf) Frenkel

sections.description:
A simple addon that will allow comments to be added to product listing.
When the addon is ON, you can select on which elements to add/remove comments.
BUT you will have to manually set comments to created listings!!!

But first thing you will need the MarketPress plugin from WPMU.

Enjoy using WPMU MarketPress Allow Comments Plugin? Please consider making a small donation to support the software’s continued development.
sections.installation:
1. Download
  2. Upload to your /wp-contents/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Where can I get the MarketPress plugin

You can get MarketPress plugin from WPMUDev.org website.

Can you add feature x, y or z to the plugin?

Short answer: maybe.

By all means please contact me to discuss features or options you’d like to see added to the plugin. I can’t guarantee to add all of them, but I will consider all sensible requests. I can be contacted here:
http://alex.frenkel-online.com/
